about.name: Aditya Narayan
about.title: Senior Software Engineer
about.summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with expertise in mobile and web development. Proven track record of developing enterprise-level applications and leading technical initiatives.

experience.description:

- Developed and deployed 5 mobile apps for enterprise clients
- Built enterprise-level Applicant Tracking System (30% efficiency improvement)
- Created interactive web dashboards (85% user engagement increase)
- Implemented Python web frameworks (20% code review time reduction)
- Designed product configurator (500,000 monthly users)
- Engineered cloud-based attendance service (40% error reduction)

Key achievements:
- Developed three major Edu-Tech platform features (20% user satisfaction increase)
- Led technical training program for 100+ professionals (30% deployment efficiency improvement)

Key achievements:
- Implemented key features for Manch Social Media App (50% MAU increase)
- Developed CI/CD proof of concept (80% deployment time reduction)

Key achievements:
- Developed HION Jobs Android app (1000+ downloads)
- Mentored seven interns (30% project contribution increase)
